subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Playing in his first Ryder Cup, Keegan Bradley has been a shot in the arm for American golf, a hyperkinetic player whose power, putting and passion have inspired his teammates.
snippet: Playing in his first Ryder Cup, Keegan Bradley has been a shot in the arm for American golf, a hyperkinetic player whose power, putting and passion have inspired his teammates.
